Docs.param: The collection to add the font to.
The assembly that contains the specified font as an embedded resource.
The embedded resource filename of the font to add, such as a True type format (TTF) or open type font (OTF) font file.
An optional alias that can also be used to reference this font.

<Extension()> Public Function AddFont (fontCollection As IFontCollection, filename As String, Optional alias As String = Nothing) As IFontCollection
static member AddFont : Microsoft.Maui.Hosting.IFontCollection * string * string -> Microsoft.Maui.Hosting.IFontCollection

Docs.param: The collection to add the font to.
The filename of the font to add, such as a True type format (TTF) or open type font (OTF) font file. Font files can be added to the 'Resources\Fonts' of a .NET MAUI project.
An optional alias that can also be used to reference this font.
Docs.summary: Adds the font specified in to the , with an optional font alias specified in .
Docs.exception: The parameter is empty or only whitespace.
